thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian Has A Massive Photo Of Herself As Jesus On The Cross | The Huffington Post
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian Has A Massive Photo Of Herself As Jesus On The Cross | The Huffington Post

author: Julia Brucculieri
title: Kourtney Kardashian Has A Massive Photo Of Herself As Jesus On The Cross | The Huffington Post
text:
Kourtney Kardashian Has A Massive Photo Of Herself As Jesus On The Cross Why. Scott Dudelson via Getty Images Kourtney Kardashian has some interesting taste in home decor. 
It appears Kourtney Kardashian is taking notes from Yeezus . 
On Friday, the mother-of-three shared a clip on her Snapchat, walking viewers through her home. At one point, she goes up the stairs to reveal a large framed photo of herself in the image of Jesus crucified on the cross, just casually hanging on the wall. Kourtney Kardashian has a picture of herself as Jesus being krucified on the kross? pic.twitter.com/1qqbdmD03y — Brett Rosner (@Brosner85) February 24, 2017 
Kourtney has not hidden her Christian beliefs ― they were the topic of an interview with Oprah in 2012 ― but we’re going to go ahead and say this probably doesn’t represent living in the image of God. ALSO ON HUFFPOST
